snippet: What to do when traditional investment choices seem riddled with deceit and incompetence? Here are some suggestions for people who want little to do with the usual road to retirement bliss.
abstract: Ron Lieber Your Money column offers several investment options for those who have grown wary of the stock market following a long series of scandals and debacles.
lead_paragraph: What to do when traditional investment choices seem riddled with deceit and incompetence? Here are some suggestions for people who want little to do with the usual road to retirement bliss.
